name: Thank you for joining the Agile Pain Relief mailing list and getting your copy of A Jargon-Free Introduction to Scrum
description: Thank you for subscribing to the Agile Pain Relief newsletter and taking advantage of our offer for a free copy of A Jargon-Free Introduction to Scrum.  You will receive an email with the download link, but we'll put it here too, for your convenience: CLICK TO DOWNLOAD YOUR COPY As an extra bonus, you will ...
